$interpreted: Scout: Officer, according to the direction of the footprints, they've headed north.
Jerome: And what's the issue with them heading north?
Scout: That place is——
Kingdom Soldier: Who's there!?
Kingdom Soldier: Those who trespass into General Lucien's assigned territory will be apprehended. No exceptions!
Scout: Wait! We are soldiers under the command of General Feiz.
Kingdom Soldier: Nonsense! General Feiz's soldiers are known for their discipline. They would not trespass without reason. Apprehend them!
Fredrica: My oh my~ You shouldn't be so rough~You'll scare the ladies away if you act like this~~
Kingdom Soldier: General, they trespassed into your territory without notice. I stopped them just in time.
Fredrica: Handsome~ Thanks for the hard work, but it's alright. I'll take over from here now.
Jerome: General Lucien, we accidentally crossed the border while pursuing bandits. I was the one who issued the order, so I will shoulder all responsibilities.
Fredrica: We've known each other for so long. You don't have to dwell on little things like these~
Jerome: General Lucien, please don't mess around with me.
Fredrica: Handsome~ Why the long face? Is it because you got jealous hearing me call someone else handsome~~
Jerome: Now is not the time for this sort of chitchat. We still have to capture the bandits.
Fredrica: No need to worry. Judging by the time, I say it should be about time~
Jerome: ....About time for what?
Fredrica: If you guys are interested, follow me~
Kingdom Soldier: General, we have followed your instructions and surrounded the bandits.
Fredrica: Thanks for the hard work~
Fredrica: Done and~ done~ Just enough time for me to go back and get my beauty sleep.
Bandit Leader: Ugh...you lackeys of the queen, let us go, now! If you don't let us go, my comrades will come back and get you for this!
Fredrica: Arara~ That would be quite terrible. If that's the case, then I'll let you guys go~~
Jerome: General! Now is NOT the time for jokes!
Fredrica: Hey~ I am the most serious person in the world. Why do you always think that I'm joking?
Bandit Leader: You're not deceiving us, are you? ......
Fredrica: I am an exemplary good woman who does not go back on her word~
Fredrica: I will let you guys go, but only under one condition. You must promise me that you will not be bandits anymore.
Bandit Leader: Okay, I promise you. I will not be a bandit anymore!
Jerome: General Lucien!
Bandit Leader: I never imagined that you would really let us go just like that...
Fredrica: Since you promised me, I expect you to hold up your end of the bargain~
Bandit Leader: We will not break our promise.
Jerome: Hold it right there!

Jerome: General, how could you set the bandits free! 
This is a serious act of treason!
Fredrica: Queen Angelia assigned me here to eliminate the bandits. Now, they are no longer bandits. Tada~ problem solved, right?
Jerome: You are just using sophistry! If you continue to get in my way, I will have no choice but to remove you by force!
Fredrica: You're getting more and more manly~I am really looking forward to the day where you become a good man ❤
Fredrica: Alrighty~ Time for my beauty sleep~~
